tags: sorry this is alot but i need to let it put and rant right now
summary: Why this sudden fixation on Dan and Phil ? You’ve never talked about them ever until Dan came out. Seems pretty shifty to me tbh
question: Why this sudden fixation on Dan and Phil ? You’ve never talked about them ever until Dan came out. Seems pretty shifty to me tbh
answer:
Hi I’m a closeted queer person who’s been watching Dan and Phil respectively for almost a decade. I’ve always loved and supported them and from the age of 13 they were 2 people I really looked up to and respected for a lot of what they’ve done. I’ve always been a backseat person in this fandom because of how it was perceived by others and frankly I’ve always be scared to be a ‘phannie’ but I’m not scared to be one anymore for so many reasons. Honestly Dan coming out has been an eye opener for me.

Do you know what it’s like to hear someone you look up to tell a story that feels so similar to your own life? Only mine wasn’t because I’m gay it’s because I’m non binary. I was bullied a lot for the fact I was a “Tom boy” people used to ask when I was gonna get a sex change, one older girl once came up to me after I’d cut my hair short and asked me if I was a boy and I said no, very defensively because I wasn’t actually sure. In the last few years I realise I identify more with the non binary label for the first time ever I bought clothes that I feel comfortable wearing that aren’t just T-shirt’s. I’m going to London pride next month for the first time ever because I’m comfortable enough to and you know why I’m comfortable enough? Because of what Dan said in his video about living your truth and accepting yourself. I was gonna go to pride with my friends as an ally. Now I’m going as myself and it’s all thanks to him.

Dan’s video would have helped 13 year old me a lot. I know for a fact that confused little girl would have been so in awe of his bravery and tbh I really believe if I’d seen something like that when I was young, I’d be so much more open and I know I’d be out, I really believe that. I’ve been jokingly saying to my friends that I’m putting myself out there in the Dan and Phil fandom for 13 year old me but really it’s not a joke. She needs this and I need this. So sorry I don’t feel like being apart of a fandom for a tv show, that’s cancelled, anymore. I’m getting no joy out of being a shadowhunters blog anymore but I am getting joy out of this

And tbh anon I’ve had this blog for 10 years. I can do whatever the fuck I want with it. Don’t like it unfollow me. I won’t be angry.

blog.name: thepeaceinmay
blog.title: i don't know what to do with my life
blog.description: i really don't/ oh and subscribe to AmazingPhil

summary: Now I'm the old hag of Dan and Phil fans let me pass on some of the wisdom I have   Hey you love them. Hey that's great. Don't...
body:
Now I’m the old hag of Dan and Phil fans let me pass on some of the wisdom I have 

  1.  Hey you love them. Hey that’s great. Don’t go into school and shout about them all day. Chances are that is something that will haunt you for the rest of your life and something people will like to throw back in your face. 
  2.  RESPECT DAN AND PHIL. I used to be one of those toxic fans who would post old photos and harass them. And I honestly regret that so much now. Honestly they may be your idols and this internet persona. But beyond it all they’re just two normal adult guys who want their privacy respected
  3. Don’t deny your sexuality. Dan put it beautifully the other day. But believe me you get scared of it you run away from it and all you’ll end up with is a massive regret of a wasted opportunity. Own that shit no matter what any fucker says 

Thank you for coming to my TED talk
